modules.title: First Throw – Setting the Stage
modules.techFocus: Setup development environment (Python, AWS CLI) and project scaffolding
modules.description: Prepare your tools and define your first practice space. Like a juggler's first throw, we'll set up our development environment and project structure without worrying about the full implementation yet.
outcomes: Development environment ready with Python and AWS CLI
Project repository initialized with proper structure
First test request made to AWS services
modules.useCase: Establishing the foundation for OTTO, our AI assistant project
modules.businessValue: Proper setup reduces future technical debt and ensures smooth development

modules.title: One Ball – First Model Deployment
modules.techFocus: Amazon Bedrock: Deploy a foundation model via API
modules.description: Deploy and call your first Bedrock model using Python SDK (Boto3). Like juggling one ball up and down reliably, we'll establish a consistent connection to our first AI model.
outcomes: Python code to invoke model implemented
Understanding of model endpoints and responses
modules.useCase: Creating the core Q&A capability for OTTO
modules.businessValue: Enables basic AI-powered responses, establishing proof of concept

video.title: Integrating Generative AI Models with Amazon Bedrock

modules.title: Articulating Your Use Case – Business First Thinking
modules.techFocus: Requirements gathering and use case definition
modules.jugglingFocus: Balancing rings and controlled 3 ball patterns
modules.description: Learn to formulate real problems and identify ROI before starting development. Like a juggler understanding their performance space, we'll define the boundaries and goals of our AI assistant.
modules.useCase: Defining OTTO's purpose and target users
modules.businessValue: Ensures development efforts align with actual business needs and user requirements

modules.title: Two Balls – Adding Memory
modules.description: Add memory to your AI assistant using DynamoDB. Like juggling two balls, we'll manage the back-and-forth between the user input and conversation history.
modules.useCase: Enabling OTTO to maintain context in conversations
modules.businessValue: Improves user experience by reducing repetition and enabling complex interactions

modules.title: Designing ROI – Cost Awareness
modules.jugglingFocus: Balancing rings and controlled 3 ball patterns
modules.description: Calculate the costs of your AI solution and compare with potential benefits. Like a juggler optimizing their movements, we'll ensure our solution is economically efficient.
outcomes: Cost breakdown of AWS services used
modules.useCase: Justifying OTTO's development and operational costs
modules.businessValue: Provides clear financial justification for the project and identifies optimization opportunities

modules.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) Course
modules.techFocus: In-depth Kubernetes training including architecture, networking, security, and troubleshooting.
modules.description: A comprehensive course by TechWorld with Nana to prepare for the CKA certification exam.
outcomes: Readiness for the CKA certification exam
modules.businessValue: Validates expertise in managing Kubernetes environments

modules.title: Slackbot System – Orchestrating 5 Balls of AI
modules.techFocus: Multi-agent orchestration with CrewAI, Bedrock, LangChain, Slack API
modules.jugglingFocus: 5 ball cascade or Mills Mess variations
modules.description: Design and implement a production-grade Slackbot driven by multi-agent collaboration, AI reasoning, and external integrations. This is your final juggling act – the full cascade of tools, APIs, and structured planning.
outcomes: CrewAI system with Six Thinking Hats method
Slackbot capable of posting, triggering AI actions
modules.useCase: End-to-end intelligent event planning system for AWS user groups
modules.businessValue: Transforms manual processes into structured, intelligent automation with community value
